br.usp.poli.takiyama.acfove
Interface MacroOperation

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConvertToStdParfactors, CountingConvert, FinalMultiplication, FullExpand, Propositionalize, Shatter
public interface MacroOperation

Represents a macro operation in (A)C-FOVE.

Author:
Felipe Takiyama

          Returns this operation cost.

Method Detail

run

Marginal run()
Executes the macro-operation. TODO: throw exception when the operation is not possible

Returns:
The resulting marginal after applying the macro-operation.

cost

int cost()
Returns this operation cost.

The cost of an operation is the size of parfactors it creates.

Returns:
This operation cost.

numberOfRandomVariablesEliminated

Returns the number of random variables that are eliminated if this operation is executed using run.

the number of random variables that are eliminated if this operation is executed
